entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is introduced as the one who has just come and is holding Harry back from following Lupin. She is described as being in charge of the situation and giving instructions to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one who is trying to follow Lupin but is held back by Mrs. Weasley. He is described as being eager to join the meeting and is given instructions by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is introduced as someone who Harry wants to follow but is not allowed to because he is not a member of the Order.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being upstairs with Hermione and waiting for the meeting to be over so they can have dinner.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being upstairs with Ron and waiting for the meeting to be over so they can have dinner.

entities.name: the order
entities.description: The Order is introduced as a group that has a meeting which Harry is not allowed to attend because he is not a member.

entities.name: troll's leg
entities.description: A troll's leg is mentioned as being used to make an umbrella stand in the house.

entities.name: shrunken heads
entities.description: Shrunken heads are mounted on a row and are described as being dark and eerie.
